title: Network Error + Lags after importing bookmarks
content:
Hi there I imported https://github.com/jameshealyio/bang-bookmarks and now my Firefox instance totally crashing and pages won't load.

I reinstall firefox, same issue I remove firefox profiles, worked for a little bit. Got synced with my account then again web pages won't load.

Any Ideas Thanks
creator: tamibam

title: Firefox crashed
content: I am trying to open pages in Firefox, but it doesn't reply. I tried to open them in Troubleshoot mode but it didn't work either. Also, I tried to send messages about crashes in about:crashes page but they do not send
creator: yusufchik2004

title: Browser revs up my memory and doesn't connect to the internet
content:
The browser revs up my memory and doesn't connect to the internet until finally it crashes.

I'm on windows 11

Please advise

Best regards Sune
creator: W.J.Stokes

title: Firefox not working
content:
Hi I went to my email provider earlier on and Firefox froze saying that a copy was running and to close - which I did. But Firefox will not access any website: just the normal waiting message.

I did a hard reboot. No joy. I tried a download. No joy. I am using Brave at present to access you. Everyhting else, email etc is working fine.

Any advice please.
creator: Austrianpeter

title: Firefox Outage
content: Is Firefox down right now? I’ve tried to open any page using it and I cannot. I’ve tried on multiple devices, and I have restarted Firefox with no change.
creator: jhlatour

title: web site opening
content:
Good day,

I have a problem with Mozilla Firefox. After few minutes of working i cannot open any website and even refresing not helps (only coled Firefox and open again helps). I reinstaled Firefox and still problem shows up. Could you hel me in this case?
creator: jakubczarnyrodvad

title: Unable to load anything
content: On 95.0.2 (64-bit) About 15 minutes ago, unable to load anything on the browser, even localhost doesn't work
creator: nds29

creator: lizziek234

title: web pages do not load.
content: web pages do not load. no web page loads, firewall settings fit and are up to date. It is also newly installed. DNS settings also fit.
creator: gerard.fass

title: Mozilla Browser Stopped working while in use
content:
I was using Mozilla Firefox Version 96.0 (64 bit), on 1/13/2022 at around 2:30 am EST to both watch Netflix while getting account balance information and transferring funds through the website of one of my financial institutions - and the browser become completely nonresponsive. Not a single website will load in the browser. If I use any other web browser, I can access the websites without a problem.

I ran updates to Mozilla and Windows earlier in the day - but nothing to my knowledge was updated or changed after I had logged into and was successfully using netflix and my financial institution website.
creator: jeffreyrobinson103

title: Problems after update
content: On my main profile I cant access a single site. Ive tried Google, Facebook, Instagram, adobe, and many others. Not a single one will open. but if I switch to another profile Im completely fine. Acts just like it should. This all happened today when Windows 10 update was being installed.
creator: strat468

title: FIREFOX IS NOT WORKING  -  WHEN WILL FIREFOX FIX THIS PROBLEM ?
content: COME ON FIREFOX ,.,.,. FIX YOUR BROWSER IT'S NOT WORKING AGAIN !!!!!!!!!!!
creator: ak.walsh

title: Firefox not working  - why not ? all other browsers work !
content:
Firefox not working - why not ? all other browsers work !

For about a month now Firefox has been slow to wake up when I switch and now today it says 'No connection', I do have Internet connection and other borowsers work and I am on-line ,..,.,you are my preferred Browser, so what's going on?

Tony
creator: ak.walsh

title: browser does not work anymore
content:
As of this morning, the Firefox browser on my work computer does not get access to any website - including mozilla itself. On the same computer Safari works without problems, on my smartphone and in the same wifi network my mobile Firefox works.

What is wrong?
creator: cpeterbauer

title: Firefox 96.0 stop working not loading any websites
content:
Hello guys,

I just dont understand what its with Firefox like 10 minutes ago just with no errors or making sompting to it dose not load any websites at all.

No crash errors no nothink, it opens but when i whant to browse anythink its not woorking.

The only think i see on firefox help > about its Checking for updates loading.

I reboolted my pc, router....etc

IE & Chrome works only firefox not.

Anyone have this issue ?
creator: cdbarbis

title: Proxy Exception v.96.0
content: We have trouble with Exception of proxy. Seems to work only with the first site, the others are ignored.
creator: piergiorgio.lancerotto

title: Firefox Unable to play Prime Videos & Netflix Videos
content:
I'm on the latest version of Firefox, and it's unable to play videos on Amazon.com & Netflix.com. Neither did the one before 96.0. I first saw this on Netflix.com and when the tech started asking questions about my operating system, I knew they had pulled a fast one. Now Amazon.com has done the same thing with Firefox. This browser should be hiding the underlying operating system, because it's not necessary. I can use both websites with Chrome and have no issue. The same version of Firefox is on my laptop, but it has no problems because that thing is on Windows 10.

I won't bother with all the nonsense written about troubleshooting, because this is strictly the functionality of those websites peeking under the browser to check the O.S. Firefox needs to fix this hole immediately! You're messing with my money now. Monopolies shouldn't be able to control our hardware like this; they're not paying for any of it.

Oh, my TV is having a problem with the apps, so I was forced to watch videos with my computer instead. My laptop screen is too small and can't have my booming speakers connected to it. My desktop monitor is 34".
creator: KingRay

title: new Firefox browser
content:
Hi FredMcD,

Thank you for your prompt reply. It is an investment website, www.aastocks.com, in which I can log on and click a button to check my portfolio, before yesterday. After Firefox update the software, I can still log in, but clicking the button sends me back to the log in page. I have tried clearing the cache cookies, removing the ad blockers etc but to no avail. Using the Microsoft Edge browser has no problem. Any thoughts?

Thanks, George Yip
creator: gyip2012

title: An extension installed globally for all users (in /usr/share/mozilla/extensions) does not load for an unobvious reason
content:
I need to automate the deployment of Firefox along with the extensions. I put three extensions (uBlock, Translate Web Pages, and Auto Tab Discard) in the /usr/share/mozilla/extensions/{ec8030f7-c20a-464f-9b0e-13a3a9e97384}/. All extensions load normally, except Auto Tab Discard. When running firefox with the -jsconsole option, I see what the screenshot shows (the message "Invalid addon ID"). But the installation to user profile is successful. I add the extension ID to manifest.json, and get the following output in the console: addons.xpi-utils WARN addMetadata: Add-on {c2c003ee-bd69-42a2-b0e9-6f34222cb046} is invalid: Error: File /usr/share/mozilla/extensions/{ec8030f7-c20a-464f-9b0e-13a3a9e97384}/{c2c003ee-bd69-42a2-b0e9-6f34222cb046} does not contain a valid manifest(resource://gre/modules/addons/XPIInstall.jsm:669:11) What can go wrong?

System: Debian 11 (bullseye) Firefox version: 91.4.1esr (amd64)

If you need any other information, please ask, I will write it down.
creator: zostajekni

title: browser redirect due to malwar
content: I have reset Firefox (as instructed dozens of times). There is malware installed that redirects me to the Yahoo search engine. I don't want that search engine, but I cannot figure out how to remove the malware.
creator: dempseykristin

title: Cannot download Firefox
content: After a subscription cancellation of a firefox software I cannot open or install Firefox. Best Buy Geek Squad tried to fix it remotely and they were not able to fix it. Why would this happen after cancelling a subscription that was making Firefox very slow. Firefox is my preferred browser and I can not use it. My email is [email removed from public] Thank you, Carlos Soto
creator: carlos73

title: New black background
content: Can anyone tell me how to return the Firefox landing page background to white? I thought it was in the preferences section, but I wasn't able to actually change the background, just look at a whole lot of pretty colours.
creator: gaylv

title: How do I change my background color in bookmarks from black to white (the way it was before)?
content: Apparently I received an update and it changed my bookmarks background color from white to black. I hate this! How can I change it back to a white background like it was before the update?
creator: dobrobo1

title: Change Browser Background Color
content: I just upgraded to version 96 (using Windows 10) and for some odd reason, the background of Youtube is now a dark gray or black. I want to get back to the normal white background. I tried changing with Fonts and Colors in settings, according to another user's complaint, but that didn't help. So tell me how to change it. Or tell me how to revert to the version before this. And how to not upgrade in the future if this kind of nonsense continues. I read some of the reasons why, but still, Mozilla should let users change things how they want it, not the techies.
creator: darkhelmet

title: Very long time user now finally walking away from firefox
content: I do not get it. This browser has everyday now for the longest time gone downhill and it is just getting worse and worse to the point it is unusable. To navigate the internet one can no longer simply use the great firefox to do so. Besides the browswer having issues itself, it seems just about every webpage does not work on firefox at all either. Sync is a joke, history doesn't even work ans saving passwords is useless. But my last issue, enough is enough and I am done. Trying for quite so time figure out why firefox is not loading my school book. It is redirect the URL a million times. Mobile and desktop FF. Use chrome and now only does it work, it is faster. Just stop the project and move on. You guys had your run and obviously someone somewhere lost their values.
creator: ihatemozillaroyally

title: Firefox does not ask if I want to save OR open a docx file (possibly others)
content:
Some weeks ago, I remember that opening certain documents after finding them in Firefox could be done by using it as a temporal file (or at least I deduce that because they were stored in a folder called temp somewhere in my computer's storage). I could do it with docx files, however it does not seem to be the case anymore. It just asks where to save it, which, although is fine, is not what I want. Given that it used to be different, I know it's possible to have it that way, so I'd like to ask: how do I customise Firefox so that I can open files as temporally stored instead of just downloading, as it used to be?

As an example, this is an document I'd like to open as a temporal file.

I hope I was clear, and thank in advance to the wonderful Mozilla community
creator: tomasfelipe29

title: Firefox 96 fails to print from Epson ET-2750
content:
Several problems with printing from Firefox 95.0.2:

Firefox will not reformat paper size from the default setting of 3"x5", or change from the default setting of printing in color. After manually setting paper size to 8"x10" and changing to black & white printing in the Firefox print menu and in the Epson printer, and clicking the Firefox Print button, the Epson printer displays an error message " PAPER DOES NOT MATCH YOUR CURRENT PRINT SETTINGS". When the "confirm current print settings" command in the printer is opened , the only command that activates the printer is the "continue printing" button, which results in a color print without ANY black ink!

Please change the Firefox print operation and menu. Upon opening the print menu, The "Preparing Print" function Immediately begins the uninterruptible process of agonizingly SLOWLY previewing EVERY page in the document before the "Custom" Button can be opened to request "Print ONLY Page One". There is also no menu item for two-sided printing, media type (photo paper, envelope, plain paper, etc.), or print quality (imitate the Safari Print Menu perhaps?)

I would appreciate help correcting these compatibility issues.
creator: pnugent3

title: Switching back to normal firefox colors without altering my theme
content:
As the title suggests, I just want firefox to be nice to use again. Since its latest update it is far from nice. Too much stuff is set to darkmode, even though I have googled like crazy and fiddled with most, if not all, about:config options to try and restore it.

I will do whatever it takes, but my firefox theme (abstract firefox) must remain intact. Surely there is something I can do in the userChrome.css or whatever it's called.

It is just so very tiring having to fix mistakes made by firefox, that keeps changing stuff for the worse. Changes that nobody ever asked for. I am giving the browser one more chance for old times sake, since I have been using it for 20 years or thereabouts. So please, firefox... stop trying to force your users into using stuff that your staff team or whatever likes to use. Think of your users.

And please help me out.

Thank you.
creator: fopibab368

title: Bookmark Folders Empty Added To Bookmark Menu
content:
Hello, I have my most used bookmarks in the "Bookmark Menu" folder. The other bookmarks are in folders located in the " Other Bookmarks" folder and I have 6 links in the "Bookmarks Toolbar".

When I need to backup I use Export Bookmarks to HTML and save on PC.

Problem is that when I use Import Bookmarks from HTML, all folders are empty including Bookmarks Toolbar. All the missing links are now added to the bottom in Bookmark Menu. I now have to cut and paste the links back into the empty folders.

Why are the links not going back to the same place when importing back.
creator: ShadowAD

title: I can't log into wowway.com email in Firefox.
content:
I can't log into wowway.com email in Firefox, but I can access my email in MS Edge. I'd rather use Firefox, as I do for everything else. I have turned off the enhanced tracking protections and turned off my ad blocker and my anti-tracking add-on from Disconnect, and it still won't work. I had this trouble earlier today when there was an internet outage in my area for my Wowway internet service, but after service returned I was able to log back into their system and open my email.

Now, I can still log into their system for my account, but when I click on the "email" icon, I get a message that says "attempting to log you into your email now" and something flashes in the bottom, left corner of the screen and my email never comes up. Normally, this message does not appear and I go right to my email account. I have also unplugged both my router and modem, waited 30 seconds and powered them back up. This did not fix the problem.

Any suggestions would be very much appreciated.

Thanks,

Andy
creator: funemail

title: Session coookies needed for Kaltura and vimeo class introductions; How do I install?
content:
I am trying to grade online assignments that are either produced in Kaltura or with phone video apps. The current iteration 96.0/Windows 10 of Firefox does not allow me to view these assignments and offers a pop up that says these apps require me to use session cookies. How to I install them? Will that need to occur once or each time I try to grade a video presentation?

It seems your browser is blocking 3rd party session cookies which are required for the Kaltura application. To resolve this issue, please update your settings to allow 3rd party cookies.
